String,sLeerzeilen as String,sLeistungsprofil as String,sAbsender as String Dim sName1 as String,sName2 as String,sName3 as String,sName4 as String,sNameKurz as String Dim sLand as String,sPLZ as String,sFirmendaten as String,iOptionInhaber as Integer Dim sAmtsgericht as String,sHRB as String,sUmsatzsteuernummer as String,sUmsatzsteuerID as String Dim sLeist_Pro_1 as String,sLeist_Pro_2 as String,sLeist_Pro_3 as String,sLeist_Pro_4 as String Dim sLeist_Pro_5 as String,sLeist_Pro_6 as String,sLeist_Pro_7 as String,sLeist_Pro_8 as String Dim sGrafik_URL as String,sSignum_URL as String,sLogo_URL as String Dim oGraphic as Object,oGraphic1 as Object,vCursor as Variant Dim sAnschrift_Eigen_1 as String,sAnschrift_Eigen_2 as String,sAnschrift_Eigen_3 as String Dim oStyleFamilies as Object,oPageStyles as Object,oPageStyle_1 as Object,oPageStyle_2 as Object Dim oBookmark As Object,oBookmarkAnchor as Object,oRangeCursor as Object Dim oSelections as Object,oSize as Object,vGraphics as Variant,iPrint_Logo as Integer Dim oTable_Logo1 as Object,oTable_Logo2 as Object,oTable_Signum as Object,iCount as integer Dim lGrafikHeight as Long,lGrafikWidth as Long,lSignumHeight as Long,lSignumWidth as Long Dim lLogoHeight as Long,lLogoWidth as Long Dim sSQL1 as String,iCountSerienbrief as Integer Dim oCursor as Object,oCursorKopf1 as Object,oCursorKopf2 as Object,oBookmarks as Object,oAnschors as Object Dim vRows_Signum as Variant,vStatus as Variant Dim Dummy()
GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN")
iCountSerienbrief=1 sSQL1="select distinct "&_ "t1.DocumentID,t1.Document_TypID,t1.Print_Typ,t1.Document_Name,t1.Nummern,t1.Anrede,"&_ "t1.Body,t1.Anschrift,t1.Gruszformel,t1.Absender,t1.Option_Signum,t1.Signum_URL,t1.Leerzeilen,t1.Print_Logo,"&_ "t2.Name1,t2.Name2,t2.Name3,t2.Name4,t2.NameKurz,t2.Land,t2.PLZ,t2.Ort,t2.Strasse,t2.Hausnummer,t2.Telefon,t2.Funktelefon,t2.Fax,t2.EMail,"&_ "t2.Url,t2.Bank,t2.BIC,t2.IBAN,t2.Geschaeftsfuehrer,t2.OptionInhaber,t2.Amtsgericht,t2.HRB,t2.Umsatzsteuernummer,t2.UmsatzsteuerID,"&_ "t2.Leist_Pro_1,t2.Leist_Pro_2,t2.Leist_Pro_3,t2.Leist_Pro_4,t2.Leist_Pro_5,t2.Leist_Pro_6,t2.Leist_Pro_7,t2.Leist_Pro_8,"&_ "t3.Grafik_URL,t1.Signum_URL,t3.Logo_URL,t3.GrafikHeight,t3.GrafikWidth,t1.SignumHeight,t1.SignumWidth,t3.LogoHeight,t3.LogoWidth,"&_ "t1.UserID,t1.EMail,t1.Fax,t1.Betreff,t1.KontaktTyp,t1.Serienbrief "&_ "from "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) &" as t1,Einstellungen as t2,Users as t3"&_ " where t2.EinstellungsID = t1.EinstellungsID"&_ " AND t3.UserID = t1.UserID"
Do While fAnzahlSerienbriefe >= iCountSerienbrief oRecord_Kontakt=oResult_Scroll(sSQL1) oRecord_Kontakt.absolute(iCountSerienbrief) SetDocUserProperty("oDocumentID",oRecord_Kontakt.getString(1)) SetDocUserProperty("oDocumentID_mit_Praefix", "S"& UCase(Left(oRecord_Kontakt.getString(60),2))& oRecord_Kontakt.getString(1)) SetDocUserProperty("oDocument_TypID",oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(2)) SetDocUserProperty("oPrint_Typ",oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(3)) SetDocUserProperty("oDocument_Name", oRecord_Kontakt.getString(4)) sNummern=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(5) sAnrede=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(6) sBody=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(7) sAnschrift=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(8) sGruszformel=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(9) sAbsender=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(10) iOption_Signum=oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(11) sSignum_URL=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(12) sLeerzeilen=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(13) iPrint_Logo=oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(14) sName1=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(15) sName2=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(16) sName3=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(17) sName4=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(18) sNameKurz=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(19) sLand=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(20) sPLZ=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(21) sOrt=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(22) sStrasse=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(23) sHausnummer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(24) sTelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(25) sFunktelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(26) sFax=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(27) sEMail=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(28) SetDocUserProperty("oEMail", oRecord_Kontakt.getString(28)) sUrl=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(29) sBank=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(30) sBIC=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(31) sIBAN=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(32) sGeschaeftsfuehrer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(33) iOptionInhaber=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(34) sAmtsgericht=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(35) sHRB=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(36) sUmsatzsteuernummer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(37) sUmsatzsteuerID=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(38) sLeist_Pro_1=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(39) sLeist_Pro_2=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(40) sLeist_Pro_3=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(41) sLeist_Pro_4=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(42) sLeist_Pro_5=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(43) sLeist_Pro_6=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(44) sLeist_Pro_7=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(45) sLeist_Pro_8=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(46) sGrafik_URL=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(47) sSignum_URL=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(48) sLogo_URL=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(49) lGrafikHeight=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(50) lGrafikWidth=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(51) lSignumHeight=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(52) lSignumWidth=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(53) lLogoHeight=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(54) lLogoWidth=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(55) SetDocUserProperty("oUserID_lokal", oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(56)) SetDocUserProperty("oEMail_Empfaenger", oRecord_Kontakt.getString(57)) SetDocUserProperty("oFax_Empfaenger", oRecord_Kontakt.getString(58)) SetDocUserProperty("oBetreff", oRecord_Kontakt.getString(59)) SetDocUserProperty("oSerienbrief", oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(61))
oStyleFamilies= oDoc.getStyleFamilies() oPageStyles = oStyleFamilies.getByName("PageStyles") oPageStyle_1 = oPageStyles.getByName("Erste Seite") oPageStyle_2 = oPageStyles.getByName("Standard") oTables = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTables") oTables = oDoc.getTextTables
Dim oFrame as Object oFrame = StarDesktop.getCurrentFrame() oFrame.setTitle(sTitle_lokal &" - Druck: "& sDocument_Name)
if iPrint_Typ = 1 AND fsInTrim(sFax_Empfaenger) <> "" AND LCase(sFaxTyp) <> "fritzfax" AND LCase(sFaxTyp) <> "yajhfc" then ' if sFaxNumberPraefix <> "" AND Len(fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger)) > CInt(iFaxLenInternNumber) then if Len(fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger)) > CInt(iFaxLenInternNumber) then Feld_fuellen("FaxNr","@@#" & fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFaxNumberPraefix & fsPlusErsetzen(sFax_Empfaenger)) & "@@") else Feld_fuellen("FaxNr","@@#" & fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger) & "@@") End if else ' if sFaxNumberPraefix <> "" AND Len(fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger)) > CInt(iFaxLenInternNumber) then if Len(fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger)) > CInt(iFaxLenInternNumber) then sFaxNummer=fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFaxNumberPraefix & fsPlusErsetzen(sFax_Empfaenger)) else sFaxNummer=fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger) End if Feld_loeschen("FaxNr") End if
if iCountSerienbrief=1 then
if iPrint_Typ = 0 AND iPrint_Logo = 0 then oPageStyle_1.TopMargin = 3200 oPageStyle_2.TopMargin = 3200 oPageStyle_1.LeftMargin = 2000 oPageStyle_2.LeftMargin = 2000
oTables.getByName("Logo1").getRows().removeByIndex(0,1) oTables.getByName("Logo2").getRows().removeByIndex(0,1) else oPageStyle_1.TopMargin = 640 oPageStyle_2.TopMargin = 640
oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sLogo_URL) ' oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.Height=lLogoHeight oGraphic.Width=lLogoWidth oTable_Logo1 = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo1 = oTables.getByName("Logo1").getCellByName("A1") oTable_Logo1.insertTextContent(oTable_Logo1, oGraphic, false)
if Len(TRIM(sGrafik_URL)) > 0 then oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sGrafik_URL) oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.VertOrient=5 oGraphic.Height=lGrafikHeight oGraphic.Width=lGrafikWidth oTable_Logo1 = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo1 = oTables.getByName("Logo1").getCellByName("A1") oCursorKopf1 = oTable_Logo1.createTextCursor() oCursorKopf1.gotoEnd(False) oTable_Logo1.insertTextContent(oCursorKopf1, oGraphic, False) End if
oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sLogo_URL) ' oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.Height=lLogoHeight oGraphic.Width=lLogoWidth oTable_Logo2 = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo2 = oTables.getByName("Logo2").getCellByName("A1") oTable_Logo2.insertTextContent(oTable_Logo2, oGraphic, false)
if Len(TRIM(sGrafik_URL)) > 0 then oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sGrafik_URL) oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.VertOrient=5 oGraphic.Height=lGrafikHeight oGraphic.Width=lGrafikWidth oTable_Logo2 = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo2 = oTables.getByName("Logo2").getCellByName("A1") oCursorKopf2 = oTable_Logo2.createTextCursor() oCursorKopf2.gotoEnd(False) oTable_Logo2.insertTextContent(oCursorKopf2, oGraphic, False) End if End if
if iOption_Signum = 1 then oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sSignum_URL) oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.VertOrient=5 oGraphic.Height=lSignumHeight oGraphic.Width=lSignumWidth oTable_Signum = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Signum = oTables.getByName("Signum").getCellByName("A1") oTable_Signum.insertTextContent(oTable_Signum, oGraphic, false) else if Len(Trim(sGruszformel)) = 0 AND Len(Trim(sAbsender)) = 0 then oTable_Signum = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Signum = oTables.getByName("Signum") vRows_Signum = oTable_Signum.getRows() vRows_Signum.removeByIndex(0,1) End if End if
sAnschrift_Eigen_1 = sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt sAnschrift_Eigen_2 = sNameKurz & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt if iPrint_Typ = 0 AND iPrint_Logo = 0 then sAnschrift_Eigen_3 = sName1 & Chr(10) & sName2 & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt else sAnschrift_Eigen_3 = sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt End if
if sLeist_Pro_1 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_1 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_2 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_2 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_3 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_3 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_4 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_4 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_5 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_5 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_6 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_6 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_7 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_7 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if if sLeist_Pro_8 <> "" then sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & Chr(8226) & " " & sLeist_Pro_8 & Chr(10) else sPlatzhalter = sPlatzhalter & Chr(10) End if sLeistungsprofil = sLeistungsprofil & sPlatzhalter
if sLeerzeilen = "" then sLeerzeilen = " " End if
if sTelefon <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = "Telefon:" sKontakt = sTelefon End if if sFax <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "Fax:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sFax else sKontakt_Bez = "Fax:" sKontakt = sFax end if End if if sFunktelefon <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "Mobil:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sFunktelefon else sKontakt_Bez = "Mobil:" sKontakt = sFunktelefon end if End if if sUrl <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "Url:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sUrl else sKontakt_Bez = "Url:" sKontakt = sUrl end if End if if sEMail <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "e-Mail:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sEMail else sKontakt_Bez = "e-Mail:" sKontakt = sEMail end if End if
if sBank <> "" then sBankverbindung_Bez = "Bankverbindung:" & Chr(10) sBankverbindung = sBank & Chr(10) & "IBAN: " & sIBAN & Chr(10) & "BIC: " & sBIC else sBankverbindung_Bez = "" sBankverbindung = "" End if
if sGeschaeftsfuehrer <> "" then if iOptionInhaber = 0 then sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez = "Geschäftsführer:" & Chr(10) elseif iOptionInhaber = 1 then sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez = "Inhaber:" & Chr(10) End if sFirmendaten = sGeschaeftsfuehrer if sUmsatzsteuerID = "" or sUmsatzsteuernummer = "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) End if else sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez = "" sFirmendaten = "" End if if sAmtsgericht <> "" then if sFirmendaten <> "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) & sAmtsgericht & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sHRB else sFirmendaten = sAmtsgericht & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sHRB end if End if if sUmsatzsteuerID <> "" then if sFirmendaten <> "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) & "UmsatzsteuerID: " & sUmsatzsteuerID else sFirmendaten = "UmsatzsteuerID: " & sUmsatzsteuerID end if End if if sUmsatzsteuernummer <> "" then if sFirmendaten <> "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) & "Umsatzsteuernummer: " & sUmsatzsteuernummer else sFirmendaten = "Umsatzsteuernummer: " & sUmsatzsteuernummer end if else sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) End if
oTables = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTables") oTables = oDoc.getTextTables
if sName1 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name1",sName1) else Feld_loeschen("Name1") End if if sName2 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name2",sName2) else Feld_loeschen("Name2") End if if sName3 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name3",sName3) else Feld_loeschen("Name3") End if if sName4 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name4",sName4) else Feld_loeschen("Name4") End if
Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_1",sAnschrift_Eigen_1) if iPrint_Typ > 0 then loesche_Falzmarken() Feld_loeschen("unzustellbar") Feld_loeschen("Anschrift_Eigen_2") else Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_2",sAnschrift_Eigen_2) end if
Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_3",sAnschrift_Eigen_3) Feld_fuellen("Leerzeilen",sLeerzeilen) Feld_fuellen("Document_Name",sDocument_Name) if Len(Trim(sAnrede)) = 0 then Feld_loeschen("Anrede") else Feld_fuellen("Anrede",sAnrede) end if Feld_fuellen("Body",sBody) if Len(Trim(sGruszformel)) = 0 then Feld_loeschen("Gruszformel") else Feld_fuellen("Gruszformel",sGruszformel) end if if Len(Trim(sAbsender)) = 0 then Feld_loeschen("Absender") else Feld_fuellen("Absender",sAbsender) end if Feld_fuellen("Nummern",sNummern) Feld_fuellen("Leistungsprofil",sLeistungsprofil)
Feld_fuellen("Kontakt_Bez",sKontakt_Bez) Feld_fuellen("Kontakt",sKontakt) Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung_Bez",sBankverbindung_Bez) Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung",sBankverbindung) Feld_fuellen("Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez",sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez) Feld_fuellen("Firmendaten",sFirmendaten) End If
Feld_fuellen("Anschrift",sAnschrift) oDoc.getTextFields().refresh()
if iSerienbrief=1 then if iPrint_Typ = 0 then if iCountSerienbrief=1 then vStatus = MsgBox("Soll der Serienbriefdruck erfolgen?",36,sTitle_lokal) if vStatus = 7 then exit sub end if end if oDoc.print(Dummy()) wait 1000 elseif iPrint_Typ = 1 then if iCountSerienbrief=1 then vStatus = MsgBox("Soll der Faxversand gemäß dem Serienbriefverteiler erfolgen?",36,sTitle_lokal) if vStatus = 7 then exit sub end if if LCase(sFaxTyp) <> "yajhfc" then Dim printprops(3) as New com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue printprops(0).Name = "Name" printprops(0).Value=sFaxPrinter printprops(1).Name = "PaperFormat" printprops(1).Value = com.sun.star.view.PaperFormat.A4 printprops(2).Name = "PaperOrientation" printprops(2).Value = com.sun.star.view.PaperOrientation.PORTRAIT oDoc.setPrinter(printprops()) end if end if if LCase(sFaxTyp) <> "yajhfc" then oDoc.print(Dummy()) else SendFaxYajHFC() End if wait 2000 sFaxNummer="" elseif iPrint_Typ = 2 then if iCountSerienbrief=1 then vStatus = MsgBox("Soll die Erzeugung der Serien-Mail erfolgen?",36,sTitle_lokal) if vStatus = 7 then exit sub end if end if
Dim sUrlAttatchement as String,oPfad as Object Dim sMailSubject AS String,sMailBody AS String
oPfad = CreateUnoService("com.sun.star.util.PathSettings")
sUrlAttatchement=ConvertToURL(oPfad.temp)&"/"& sDocumentID_mit_Praefix &"_"& iCountSerienbrief &".pdf" oDoc.storeToURL(sUrlAttatchement,Array(MakePropertyValue("FilterName","writer_pdf_Export")))
sMailSubject=fsInTrim(fsReplace(fsReplace(fsReplace(fsReplace(sDocument_Name,Chr(34)," "),Chr(10)," - "),Chr(13)," - "),","," "))
sMailBody="Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, " & Chr(10) & Chr(10) & "im Anhang finden Sie unsere Dokument."
SendMail(sEMail_Empfaenger,sEMail,sMailSubject,sMailBody,sUrlAttatchement)
End if End if iCountSerienbrief=iCountSerienbrief+1 Loop
End Sub
